Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: "You've arrived at the right moment. The surrounding Corrupted are taking up part of the Purifying Force's attention.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'His signal has stopped right ahead. Inside that enclosed energy chamber.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'That should be what he was looking for.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "If that is the same energy that caused Karen's abnormality, then Kamui's stability also comes into question.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "It's not me breaking your promise, but orders are orders.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "We've made our call. Kamui is a threat that requires purifying.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "How'd you guarantee that it ain't a monster coming out of that tin can?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Bianca, you're the leader of the Purifying Force.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Then don't come crying to me when you get a mention in my report.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'You have your standards, I have mine.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Oh, what a load of bull you spill.', 4: '2'}
